Your First Program

Every C program starts with the main() function. Here's an example of a simple program:

#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
    printf("Hello, World!\n");
    return 0;
}

Steps to run:

  1. Save the code as hello.c
  2. Compile with gcc hello.c -o hello
  3. Run with ./hello

This program prints Hello, World! to the console.
